hero.title: Proof of Concept (PoC)
hero.subtitle: Turn your idea into a working product in one hour

saveMoney.title: Save time and money on product development
saveMoney.description: Instead of waiting months for app development and spending tens of thousands of dollars, you'll receive a working prototype in one hour. Your idea will turn into a clickable demo that you can immediately show to clients or investors.

showDontTell.title: Show instead of explain
showDontTell.description: Stop wasting time on long PowerPoint presentations and endless explanations. Thanks to a visual presentation of your product, everyone will immediately understand what you mean. An interactive prototype speaks louder than a thousand words.

verify.title: Verify your idea before major investment
verify.description: Don't risk large budgets on an uncertain idea. For a fraction of the cost of a traditional MVP, check if your idea makes business sense. Gather feedback from users and potential clients on a real, working product.

quickStart.label: 1. Quick Start PoC - Working Prototype (24h)
quickStart.title: Write it, see the result immediately
quickStart.description: Fill out a simple form describing your idea, and we'll immediately start working on your prototype.
quickStart.subtitle: What you get:
quickStart.feature1: Clickable React app - ready for presentation
quickStart.feature2: Working prototype - that looks like a real application
quickStart.feature3: Interactive interface - to show investors and first customers
quickStart.highlight: This is the basic package that will allow you to quickly verify your idea and see what your product will look like in practice.

interactiveApp.label: 2. Interactive PoC Application
interactiveApp.title: Clickable React app - working like a real application (3 days)
interactiveApp.feature2: Clickable demo that works immediately like a real application
interactiveApp.feature3: Lead collection system - app accepts submissions and contact data
interactiveApp.feature4: Prototype ready to show investors and collect real customers
interactiveApp.highlight: Your product will not only look like a finished application, but will actually work and collect leads from day one.

completePackage.label: 3. COMPLETE PoC PACKAGE - Product Presentation
completePackage.title: Everything you need for an effective presentation (7 days)
completePackage.subtitle: Package includes:
completePackage.description: This is a complete solution for presenting your product to investors, business partners, or first customers.

custom.label: 4. Custom Tailored PoC Project
custom.title: Have unusual requirements? Contact us
custom.description: Every idea is different. If standard packages don't meet your needs, we'll develop a custom offer tailored to your project.

websitePackage.label: 5. PoC PACKAGE - Professional Website with AI
websitePackage.title: Your website ready in (14 days)
websitePackage.subtitle: What you get:
websitePackage.feature3: Contact forms integrated with your system
websitePackage.feature5: AI Assistant talking to customers "in your company's language" - trained in your business specifics, answering customer questions 24/7
websitePackage.feature6: Working website ready for publication in 14 days
websitePackage.highlight: Forget about months of waiting for a website. Your website with intelligent AI assistant ready in two weeks.

payAndHave.title: "Pay and Have" Model
payAndHave.description: No hidden costs, no surprises. You pay the agreed price and immediately receive a working prototype.

transparency.title: Price Transparency
transparency.description: You see the exact price before ordering. No "we'll quote you later" - you pay exactly what you see on the page.

immediateStart.title: Immediate Start
immediateStart.description: No waiting for quotes, meetings, negotiations. You fill out the form, pay, and we start working right away.

predictableTimeline.title: Predictable Timeline
predictableTimeline.description: You know exactly when you'll receive the product. Not "someday", not "maybe next week" - specific dates in the admin panel.

projectControl.title: Project Control
projectControl.description: The admin panel gives you full control. You see progress, communicate with the team, submit feedback - everything in one place.

qualityGuarantee.title: Quality Guarantee
qualityGuarantee.description: 2 rounds of revisions included in the price. We don't give up until you're satisfied.

howItLooksInPractice.title: How does it look in practice?

step1.action: You fill out the form and pay

step2.action: You receive access to the panel and confirmation

step3.action: You see the first draft (quick start prototype)

step4.action: You receive the finished product (depending on the package)

step5.action: You submit feedback, we make corrections

step6.action: You receive and enjoy the finished product

howItLooksInPractice.footer: Zero stress. Zero guessing. Zero hidden costs.

adminPanel.title: Admin Panel
adminPanel.subtitle: Everything in one place: admin.corballyconcepts.com

features.access: Access to the panel (login via your email)

adminPanel.footer: You don't have to chase us with emails. You see everything in the panel in real-time.

startups.title: Startups
startups.description: that need an MVP to present to investors

companies.title: Companies
companies.description: wanting to quickly verify new functionality

innovators.title: Innovators
innovators.description: needing a quick prototype for presentation

cta.title: Start today
cta.description: Don't waste time on lengthy development processes. Turn your idea into a working product in one hour and start gathering feedback from real users.

items.question: What's the difference between Quick Start PoC and Interactive App PoC?
items.answer: Quick Start PoC (€349) is a basic React prototype ready in 24h - great for quick idea validation. Interactive App PoC (€488) is a full-featured application with lead collection system that works like a real app and is ready in 3 days. Choose Quick Start if you just want to show the concept, and Interactive App if you need a working product to collect your first customers.

items.question: How much does each PoC package cost and what's included in the price?
items.answer: 1) Quick Start PoC - €349 ($380, 24h): clickable React app ready for presentation. 2) Interactive App PoC - €488 ($532, 3 days): working app with lead system. 3) Complete Package - €651 ($710, 7 days): explainer video + landing page + sales content. 4) Custom Project - individually priced. 5) Professional Website with AI - €3,814 ($4,160, 14 days): full website with 24/7 AI assistant. All prices are final - 'Pay and Have' model with no hidden costs.

items.question: How long does each package take to complete?
items.answer: Quick Start PoC - 24 hours, Interactive App PoC - 3 days, Complete Package - 7 days, Professional Website with AI - 14 days. Custom Project depends on scope. Implementation starts immediately after filling out the form and payment. Upon completion, you receive access to the admin panel where you can manage your project.

items.question: What does the Complete PoC Package include?
items.answer: The Complete Package (€651 / $710, 7 days) is a comprehensive product presentation solution containing: 1) Professional explainer video presenting your product, 2) Landing page with lead collection system, 3) Ready-made sales content tailored to your industry. It's the ideal solution for presenting to investors, business partners, or first customers - you get everything you need in one package.

items.question: Does the Professional Website with AI package include an AI chatbot?
items.answer: Yes! The Professional Website with AI package (€3,814 / $4,160, 14 days) includes an intelligent AI assistant trained in your company's specifics. The chatbot speaks 'your company language', answers customer questions 24/7, knows your products and services. Additionally, you get: modern responsive interface, analytics, contact forms, 3-4 subpages + dedicated contact page. Website ready for publication in 14 days.

items.question: What technologies are used to create PoC prototypes?
items.answer: All our PoC prototypes are created in React - the modern and most popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces. We also use TypeScript for code safety, Tailwind CSS for responsive design, and Vite for fast development. For packages with backend, we use Supabase (database, authentication, storage). Thanks to these technologies, your prototype can be easily expanded into a full production application.

items.question: Will I receive the source code of my application or prototype?
items.answer: Yes, you get full access to your prototype's source code through the admin panel (admin.corballyconcepts.com). You can download the code, modify it, expand it, or hand it over to your developer team. The code is written clearly using best practices, making further development easier. Additionally, if you choose to expand to a full application, we can continue working on the same codebase.

items.question: Can I test the prototype before final acceptance?
items.answer: Of course! After creating the prototype, you receive a link to the working version that you can test on any device (computer, tablet, phone). You can show the prototype to potential customers, your team, or investors and gather feedback. If something needs improvement, we can make modifications. Our goal is to deliver a prototype that 100% meets your expectations.

items.question: What does the PoC package ordering and implementation process look like?
items.answer: The process is simple: 1) Choose the right package and click 'Order', 2) Fill out the form describing your idea (the more details, the better), 3) Pay for the package, 4) We start work immediately, 5) You receive regular progress updates, 6) Upon completion, you get access to the admin panel with your prototype, 7) You can test and report feedback. The entire process is transparent and fast.

items.question: What does the 'Pay and Have' model mean?
items.answer: The 'Pay and Have' model means you pay a fixed price upfront and immediately receive a working prototype - no hidden costs, no surprises, no additional fees. There are no hourly billings or negotiations. You know exactly how much you'll pay and what you'll get. It's a simple, transparent, and effective approach that eliminates the risk of budget overruns. Pay once, have the product.

items.question: Can I order a custom package tailored to my needs?
items.answer: Absolutely! If standard packages don't meet your needs, we offer Custom Tailored PoC Projects. Every idea is different - some projects require unusual functionalities, integrations with external systems, specific design, or longer implementation time. Contact us through the form or email, describe your requirements, and we'll develop a custom offer tailored exactly to your project and budget.

items.question: Can I continue developing and modifying the prototype after delivery?
items.answer: Yes! You have full control over the code and can freely modify it. You receive access to the admin panel and code repository. You can: 1) Make changes yourself if you have a developer team, 2) Commission us for further development - we offer prototype expansion services to full applications, 3) Hand over the code to another company - you own all the code. The prototype is yours and you can do whatever you want with it.

items.question: Is it possible to expand the PoC into a full production application?
items.answer: Yes, this is one of the main goals of our PoC prototypes! All prototypes are created with expansion in mind. We use professional technologies (React, TypeScript, Supabase) that allow for scaling. After validating the idea on the prototype, we can expand it with: full backend, advanced functionalities, payment integrations, user system, mobile apps, and much more. It's much faster and cheaper than building from scratch.

items.question: Do you offer technical support after project delivery?
items.answer: Yes, we offer technical support. After prototype delivery: 1) You receive documentation and usage instructions, 2) You have access to the admin panel where you can manage the project, 3) In case of technical problems, you can contact us via email or contact form, 4) We offer paid support packages if you need regular assistance, 5) We can also train your team in system operation. Our goal is to ensure you succeed with our product.

items.question: Who are the PoC packages for? Who can use them?
items.answer: PoC packages are ideal for: 1) Startups that need an MVP for investor presentations without spending tens of thousands on full development, 2) Entrepreneurs testing new business ideas before major investment, 3) Companies that want to quickly verify new functionality or product, 4) Innovators needing a quick prototype for presentations at competitions or pitches, 5) Anyone who has an idea for an app or website and wants to see how it will look in practice - without technical knowledge or programming skills.
